item.title: 【HD Live Performances】UHDTV 4K - Usher - Super Bowl LVIII Halftime Show UHDTV HDR HLG H265 2160p DD5.1-ilya2129
item.description:
"My Way" (intro)
"Caught Up" (with elements of "U Don't Have to Call" and "Superstar")
"Love in This Club"
"If I Ain't Got You" (with Alicia Keys)
"My Boo" (with Alicia Keys)
"Confessions Part II"
"Burn" (with elements of "Nice & Slow")
"U Got It Bad" (with H.E.R. and elements of "Bad Girl")
"OMG" (with will.i.am)
"Turn Down for What" (with Lil Jon)
"Yeah!" (with Lil Jon, Ludacris and elements of "Get Low")
